org.opennaas.extension.idb.test.database
Class DatabaseTest

java.lang.Object
  org.opennaas.extension.idb.test.AbstractTest
      org.opennaas.extension.idb.database.test.DatabaseTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestConnectionsRelation, TestDomainRelation, TestDomSupportedAdaptionRelation, TestDomSupportedBandwidthRelation, TestDomSupportedSwitchRelation, TestEndpointsRelation, TestInterdomainLinkRelation, TestNRPSConnectionsRelation, TestReservationRelation, TestServiceRelation, TestSubscriptionRelation, TestTNAPrefixRelation
public abstract class DatabaseTest
extends AbstractTest

abstract test-class for DB-Tests. every test for a relation should contain the basic actions of DB-handling. So there is one common main-workflow, which should be tested: save, load, edit and delete a relation-tuple additional referential integrity tests should be performed, if there exist references. Important! Every single test should be independent of the others, because there is nor ordering in JUnit!

Author:
Alexander Zimmermann (zimmerm2@cs.uni-bonn.de)
